name: Stonk Simulator 0.2
description:
Well, hello there traveler. This is a short stock trading game, that I made in html and javascript. You could call it a prototype of some sort.

Point of the game is to learn the algorithms and earn a fortune. Can you beat the market?

A couple of weeks ago I saw some stock trading games on the website, and I wanted to develop and give my take on a stock trading game.

If this game brings you just a little joy, or maybe inspires you to develop your own game, then I am truly happy.

Maybe I will continue developing in the future, maybe I won't, only time will tell.
